# üéµ NextBeat Music Player üé∂

A sleek, offline Android music player app built with Java and Android SDK. NextBeat scans local mp3 files from your device, allowing you to play your favorite tracks with a clean Material Design interface .

---

## üöÄ Features

- üìÇ Scan and display all mp3 files stored on your device
- üé∂ Music playback with play, pause, next, and previous controls
- üéõÔ∏è SeekBar for interactive track seeking
- üåô Dark Mode toggle with AppCompatDelegate integration
- üîç Real-time search to filter songs
- üì≤ RecyclerView-based modern UI for song listing

---

## üì¶ Tech Stack

**üì± Platform & Language**
- **Java** ‚Äî Core language for Android app development.
- **Android SDK** ‚Äî Android native development tools and APIs.

**üõ†Ô∏è Development Environment**
- **Android Studio** ‚Äî Official IDE for Android app development with integrated device emulator and debugging tools.
- **Gradle** ‚Äî Build automation system for managing dependencies and project builds.

**üé® UI & UX Components**
- **XML Layouts** ‚Äî Declarative UI design using ConstraintLayout and LinearLayout.
- **RecyclerView** ‚Äî Efficient and flexible component for displaying scrollable lists.
- **Material Design Components** ‚Äî Following Google‚Äôs Material Design guidelines for clean, modern, and responsive UIs.
- **AppCompatDelegate** ‚Äî Theme management with runtime Dark Mode switching.

**üé∂ Media & Playback**
- **MediaPlayer API** ‚Äî Android‚Äôs native media playback engine for handling mp3 files.
- **ForegroundService** ‚Äî Keeps music playback running even when the app is in the background.
- **NotificationManager** ‚Äî Custom media notification with interactive playback controls.

**üîî Permission Handling**
- **Dexter Library** ‚Äî Simplifies runtime permission requests and handling, ensuring a smooth user experience.


**üîç Utility & Features**
- **TextWatcher** ‚Äî Real-time search functionality within the song list.
- **Intent & Bundle Management** ‚Äî Seamless activity transitions with data passing.
- **EdgeToEdge API** ‚Äî Modern edge-to-edge UI support for immersive designs (Android 10+).

---

   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/yourusername/NextBeat-Music-Player.git
